title: Deeper Than The Ocean
lyrics:
Yeah
The Atomix, The Atomix
People swear they know me
They don't know shit
It get deep, deep, deeper than the ocean

Deeper than the ocean, I got feelings that I hide away

Box up my emotions, make sure they don't see the light of day

She see how I'm moving, now she telling me she tryna date

Yeah, you see how I'm moving

So you know I don't got time to waste (oh, woah, oh)

Yeah, you know I don't got time to waste (oh, woah, oh)

Yeah, you know, oh, woah (I told ya)

Yeah, you know I don't got time to waste (yeah, I told ya)

Oh, woah, oh, woah



Two strikes, that's all that you had

Two strikes, that's all that you had

Now you fucked it up with me, now you mad

Now you fucked it up with me, now you sad, yeah

Fucked your girl, got caught

Hit that twice, she hot (she hot)

They must think I'm stupid, yeah

I can't wife no thot

Lying to you daily, saying where she not

These hoes is Decepticons, I'm on Autobot

That's the kid in me, must be kidding me

If you thought one day, I'd be doing shows in Italy

Yeah, I wasn't supposed to make it, that's the little me

Now I'm the one putting all the gifts under my Christmas tree



Deeper than the ocean, I got feelings that I hide away

Box up my emotions, make sure they don't see the light of day

She see how I'm moving, now she telling me she tryna date

Yeah, you see how I'm moving

So you know I don't got time to waste (oh, woah, oh)

Yeah, you know I don't got time to waste (oh, woah, oh)

Yeah, you know, oh, woah (I told ya)

Yeah, you know I don't got time to waste (yeah, I told ya)

Oh, woah, oh, woah



Yeah

Fighting off these demons, pray to Jesus that they go away

Fighting off these demons, pray to Jesus that they go away

Money got me cheesing, finally seen it in my homies face

Got my whole team in and we treat Neiman's like a grocery place

Yeah, that means cash out

Ring me up, the fast route

Write it all, tax back

Big checks, cash that

I'm still getting to it, you ain't even gotta ask that

Fans saw me cruising, now they pulling out they Snapchat

Yeah, that means cash out

Ring me up, the fast route

Write it all, tax back

Big checks, cash that

Came up out of nowhere, they like, "what's this?"

Everybody wonder what the fuss is



Deeper than the ocean, I got feelings that I hide away

Box up my emotions, make sure they don't see the light of day

She see how I'm moving, now she telling me she tryna date

Yeah, you see how I'm moving

So you know I don't got time to waste (oh, woah, oh)

Yeah, you know I don't got time to waste (oh, woah, oh)

Yeah, you know, oh, woah (I told ya)

Yeah, you know I don't got time to waste (yeah, I told ya)

(oh, woah, oh, woah)



It get deep, deep, deeper than

It get deep, deep, deeper than the ocean

Than the ocean

Oh, woah, oh, woah
